div.h1: Our Process To Delivering A Heart-Winning Design
div.p: Navigating a successful commercial interior design project necessitates exceptional planning, a professional approach, and a concrete understanding of spaces – so they can be functional while being aesthetically pleasing. At CIDS.DESIGN, we assist our clients in conceptualising phenomenal interiors that not only exude warmth and positivity but also amplify the property value.

We undertake a detailed introductory discussion of every project's requirements, paying undivided attention to your vision and aspirations. Fine-tuning into the context of the project's brief and the broader design goals in detail, our team sets the tone, look, and feel of each and every space with utmost perfection. To define the overall aesthetics of the interiors, we create ideas, form inspirational mood boards, and give creative design directions. At CIDS.DESIGN, we also closely look at the flow and functionality of spaces within the experimental parameters of the built environment.

Our professionals create plans for each space while exploring layouts for rooms, lobbies, cafes, and others with appropriate lighting, artwork, and furnishing – all articulated to determine how individual elements can be used. A series of concept boards are built, forming the basis for materials and furniture specifications needed for the interior finishings. At CIDS.DESIGN, we extensively consider the interior detailing required for flooring, walls, and structures by taking into account the key focal points such as accent decor, fireplaces, artefacts, and more. We also pay great attention to how the interiors relate to the outdoor surrounding areas like gardens and landscapes.

Every project detail is strategically analysed, coordinated, and optimised to drive innovation and transformation. We provide comprehensive designs, interior plans, and elevations with technical and detailed 3D designs for different spaces. Our sourcing team assembles uniquely blended fabrics, furniture, and equipment (FF&E), paying extra attention to materials, textiles, decorative lighting, and furnishing. Each interior we create elevate by art and collectibles meticulously sourced from the best parts of the world. Incredible emphasis is laid on the quality and standards that enable us to surpass client expectations while also being under budget.

Drawing upon our industry knowledge and multi-year expertise in offering bespoke interior design services, we ensure that all our projects tell different success stories. We work closely with our partners and experts during the installation of lighting, furniture, curtains, picture hangings, and other equipment. While reaching completion of the program, we dress and style the spaces in accordance with our interior design plan for a flawless and smooth handover. The most satisfying part of our work is adding the finishing touches and final details, making the entire project personalised, immaculate, and characterful.
